import { useState } from "react" import { UseEditProduct } from "../hooks/useEditProduct" const Edit = () => { const [title,setTitle] = useState(null) const [price,setPrice] = useState(null) const [number,setNumber] = useState(null) const [instagram,setInstagram] = useState(null) const [telegram,setTelegram] = useState(null) const [category,setCategory] = useState('ورزش') const [about,setAbout] = useState(null) const {error,isloading,EditProduct} = UseEditProduct() const submitHandler = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await EditProduct(title,about,price,category,number,instagram,telegram) } return (

setTitle(e.target.value)} className="form-control text-end " />

); } export default Edit;
